title: Remove duplicate time offset adjustment from homepage

requirements.summary: Remove the duplicate time offset adjustment UI component ('Saat Düzeltmesi') from the homepage since this functionality is already available in the Settings page
acceptanceCriteria: The time offset adjustment component is no longer visible on the homepage
The time offset adjustment functionality remains fully functional in the Settings page
No visual gaps or layout issues appear on the homepage after removal

file_operations.description: Remove the time offset adjustment UI section that displays 'Saat Düzeltmesi' label, 'Diyanet'e göre dakika farkı (+ veya -)' description, the offset input control, and 'Şu anki düzeltme: X dakika' display. This component is redundant as the same functionality exists in the Settings tab. Ensure no visual gaps remain after removal and verify that all other homepage sections (location selection, prayer times display, weather, weekly prayer times, countdown) remain intact and properly spaced.

Review and remove any time offset editing UI elements if they appear in this component when rendered on the homepage. According to the file summary, this component 'supports time offset editing' which may be the duplicate UI being referenced. Verify that time offset adjustments are only accessible through the Settings page, and ensure the prayer times display on the homepage remains read-only without inline editing controls.
